Reviews.Title: “Great Benefit for Money Value”
Reviews.Author: mtorres108
Reviews.Content: stayed city express weekend girls friends opinion bests hotel location service located street fine plaza shopping eating starbucks pharmacy etc 1 block nice paseo reforma safe convinient location stay extra towels hairdryers provided righ hotel staff wine service perfectly serviced didnt wait checkin time left lugage front office extra charge words service excellent continental breakfast ok expect lot breakfasts simply ok special offer menu eggs typical foods 2 matrimonial beds matrimonial doesnt mean queen king sized sized bed comfortable 2 people sleep atayed 12th floor quiet dark night appliances bathroom amenities available running perfectly ill definetly stay im running lower cost trip theres holiday inn shopping plaza

Reviews.Title: “Great for 1 night stay”
Reviews.Author: EliteLevel
Reviews.Content: looking short term hotel location located walking distance pick hotel front desk staff friendly smalls 96 sq ft air conditioner unit breakfast options clean observed food tray 1 half day middle corridor internet wireless speed

Reviews.Title: “City Express was great”
Reviews.Author: El-Yuca-Ingles
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights city express reforma 1st week feb found hotel fine pleasant quiet comfortable bed bathroom nice shower spotlessly clean wireless internet fine included breakfast holiday inn express reforma stayed couple weeks previously restaurant day eat meals eating drinking options half price hi express consider deal corner city express business event rented meeting 2 days reservation efficiently handled ready laid request overall happy hotel stay doubt

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: YoungDiver
Reviews.Content: stay location excellent front mall calm night lot restaurants nearby exciting night life thats safe walking pay bad shower little dirty walls bit mold bed pillows comfortable
